about_the_game:
Secret Enemy: Cosmic Fighting is an action-packed running game that takes you on an epic journey through the cosmos. In this fast-paced adventure, every step you take propels you deeper into a vibrant and challenging universe where danger and excitement await at every turn.


Gameplay Features:

  • Endless Running Action: Dash through stunning cosmic landscapes, constantly on the move to avoid obstacles and enemies. The endless running mechanic ensures that each game session is unique and offers new challenges.

  • Energy Management: Keep a close eye on your energy levels, which deplete over time. You must strategically touch special cells scattered throughout the environment to spawn enemies. Defeat these enemies to boost your energy and keep running.

  • Power-Ups and Gifts: Along your journey, collect gifts that provide powerful power-ups. These boosts can give you an edge in your quest, helping you defeat enemies and bosses more efficiently.

  • Epic Boss Battles: Prepare to face off against powerful bosses that block your path. These formidable foes require skill and strategy to defeat. Each boss battle is a test of your abilities and a key to advancing to the next level.

  • Level Progression: With each boss defeated, you level up and encounter new, tougher enemies. The game evolves as you progress, introducing new challenges and keeping the gameplay fresh and engaging.

  • Immersive Cosmic Environments: Explore beautifully designed cosmic landscapes that change as you advance. The vibrant and dynamic environments add to the excitement and immersion of the game.

Why You'll Love It:

Secret Enemy: Cosmic Fighting offers a perfect blend of fast-paced action, strategic gameplay, and endless adventure. The simple controls make it easy to pick up and play, but the increasing difficulty ensures that mastering the game is a rewarding challenge. Whether you're a casual gamer looking for a quick and fun distraction or a hardcore player seeking a challenging and engaging experience, this game has something for everyone.

Key Highlights:

Dynamic and Engaging Gameplay: The combination of endless running, energy management, and enemy battles creates a unique and compelling gameplay experience.

Challenging Boss Fights: Each boss encounter is a highlight, providing intense and thrilling battles that test your skills.

Beautiful Cosmic Aesthetics: The game's visuals are a treat, with stunning cosmic environments that make each run visually captivating.

Continuous Progression: The level-up system ensures that the game remains challenging and engaging as you advance, with new enemies and obstacles to overcome.


Join the Adventure:
Are you ready to conquer the cosmos and become the ultimate cosmic fighter? Lace up your virtual running shoes and embark on the adventure of a lifetime in Secret Enemy: Cosmic Fighting. Download it now and see how far you can go!

name: Secret Enemy : Cosmic fighting

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Grapics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Not required
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: i3 Quad core processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 710 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • VR Support: No

short_description: Embark on an epic adventure in Secret Enemy, where the cosmos is your playground! Be careful with special cells, you will need it to boost energy but not now. Bosses and their soldiers wait for you. Simple to play but hard to master. Can you conquer the cosmos?
